鳵字的基本解释

鳵
bǎo
古同“鸨”。

鳵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎo］
［《廣韻》博抱切，上晧，幫。］
“鸨1”的繁体字。亦作“鳵1”。
(1)鸟名。似雁而略大，头小，颈长，背部平，翅膀阔，尾巴短。羽色颈部为淡灰色，背部有黄褐和黑色斑纹，腹面近白色。常群栖草原地带，飞止有行列，足健善驰，能涉水。肉粗味美，可供食用。羽毛可作装饰品。
(2)指老妓或妓女的假母。
(3)毛黑白相杂的马。

鳵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳵； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1482第19
【玉篇】布老切，與鴇同。性不止樹。【班固·西都賦】鶬鴰鳵鶂。李註鳵似鴈無後趾。【埤雅】鳵無舌，兔無?。【管子·輕重甲篇】非十鈞之弩，不能中鵾雞鷺鳵。又叶彼五切【徐幹·齊都賦】鴐鵞鶬鴿，鴻鴈鷺鳵。連軒翬霍，覆水掩渚。

考證：〔【班固·西都賦】鶬鴰鳵鶂。【註】鳵似鷹而大，無趾。〕　謹照原文改李註鳵似鴈無後趾。
鳵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鳵字的起名意思

暂无。

Loach
Basic explanation of words
Loach
bǎo
The ancient same "bustard".
Loach
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎo］
["Guangyun" Bo Huoqi, Shanghao, help. ]
Traditional characters for "鸨1". Also known as "鳵1".
(1) The name of the bird. It is slightly larger like a wild goose, with a small head, a long neck, a flat back, broad wings and a short tail. The feather-colored neck is light gray, with brown and black markings on the back, and almost white on the ventral surface. Often in the grassland area, there are ranks in the flight, the feet are healthy and good, and they can wading. The meat is coarse and delicious and ready for consumption. Feathers can be used as decorations.
(2) Refers to the fake mother of an old prostitute or a prostitute.
(3) Horses with mixed hairs.
Loach
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鳵; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1482 Page 19
[Jade articles] Bu Laoqie, the same as the bustard. Sex is more than trees. 【Banggu·Xidu Fu】The 鶬鸹鹵鶂. Li Zhu's loach is like a goose without hind toes. [Bai Ya] The snake has no tongue, and the rabbit has no? [Guanzi·Light and Heavy Armor] It is not a crossbow of ten-junctions, and can not be used in the rooster, the rooster, the rooster. Also leaves five cuts [Xu Gan·Qi Du Fu] 鵞鶬鶬鵞鶬鵞鶬鵞鶬鵞鶬鵞鶬鵲鵲. Lian Xuanhuihuo, covered with water. Textual research: [[Ban Gu·Xidu Fu] 鶬鸹鹵鶂. [Note] The loach is as big as an eagle and has no toes. 〕 　 I would like to change the Li Zhuyu according to the original text, like a goose without hind toes.
